Archers.name: Archers
Archers.description: This unit can attack any opposed unit. Successful Power tests the unit makes against opposed units that are not exposed inflict only 1 casualty.

Camel Riders.name: Camel Riders
Camel Riders.description: This unit has advantage on Defense and Command Tests while in desert or planes terrain.

First Strike.name: First Strike
First Strike.description: When deployment ends, this unit activates.

Aaauuugh!!!.name: Aaauuugh!!!
Aaauuugh!!!.description: When this unit breaks, all adjacent units suffer 1 casualty.

Adaptable.name: Adaptable
Adaptable.description: This unit has advantage on Morale and Command tests.

Aerial Bombardment.name: Aerial Bombardment
Aerial Bombardment.description: If this unit spends an activation doing nothing, it can use its next activation to target a fortification by making a DC 13 Power test. On a success, it deals 1d4 + 2 damage to the fortification.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: This unit does not suffer movement penalties when fighting underwater, or in rain or mud.

Arcadian.name: Arcadian
Arcadian.description: This unit has advantage on Powertests to resist battle magic.

Barbs.name: Barbs
Barbs.description: An opposed infantry unit that makes asuccessful Power test as part of an attack against this unit suffers 1 casualty.

Battle Hymn.name: Battle Hymn
Battle Hymn.description: This unit has a bonus to Morale equal to its commander's domain size, as do allied units while adjacent to this unit.

Better Than One.name: Better Than One
Better Than One.description: When this unit attacks an opposed unit, it can also attack any other adjacent opposed unit.

Big.name: Big
Big.description: This unit has advantage on Power tests against units whose casualties are lower thanthis unit's.

Blanket Fire.name: Blanket Fire
Blanket Fire.description: As an action, choose a rank on the battlefield. Attack each unit in that rank. Recharge 4-6.

Blinding.name: Blinding
Blinding.description: When an opposed unit fails an Attack test against this unit, the opposed unit is disoriented.

Burning.name: Burning
Burning.description: Each opposed unit that activates adjacent to this unit suffers 1 casualty.

Burrow.name: Burrow
Burrow.description: As an action, remove this unit from the battlefield. On its next activation, place the unit in any empty space. The unit is disoriented until the end of that activation.

Chaos Vulnerability.name: Chaos Vulnerability
Chaos Vulnerability.description: This unit has disadvantage on Power tests to resist battle magic.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If this unit moves at least 1 space before it attacks, it has advantage on Attack tests for this activation as long as the target is in the direction the unit moved.

Chorus Of Victory.name: Chorus Of Victory
Chorus Of Victory.description: As an action, choose a rank on the battlefield. Each allied unit in that rank increments its casualty die and has advantage on Attack tests until the end of its next activation. Recharge 6.

Close Range.name: Close Range
Close Range.description: This unit has advantage on Attack tests and Power tests against adjacent units.

Cloud Of Darkness.name: Cloud Of Darkness
Cloud Of Darkness.description: Opposed units have disadvantage on Attack tests against this unit.

Collateral Damage.name: Collateral Damage
Collateral Damage.description: When this unit makes a successful Power test against an infantry or artillery unit, the unit opposite the target also suffers 1 casualty.

Consume..name: Consume.
Consume..description: As an action, this unit targets an opposed unit with lower casualties than it that it can attack. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Power test or break. Recharge 5-6.

Corrode.name: Corrode
Corrode.description: When this unit makes a successful Attack test against an opposed unit, that unit takes -2 to Attack and Defense. Each opposed unit can be affected by this trait only once per battle.

Corrosive Breath.name: Corrosive Breath
Corrosive Breath.description: As an action, choose three adjacent opposed units. Each unit must succeed ona Power test (DC = 8 + this unit's size) or suffer 2 casualties and gain one acid token. The acid token inflicts 1 casualty. Recharge 5-6.

Create Dead.name: Create Dead
Create Dead.description: If this unit causes an opposed unit to break, replace that unit with a Ghoul Infantry unit under the command of this unit's commander. The new unit can act on the commander's next turn.

Damage Resistant.name: Damage Resistant
Damage Resistant.description: Successful Attack tests against this unit inflict no casualties. Successful Power tests inflict casualties normally.

Daylight Weakness.name: Daylight Weakness
Daylight Weakness.description: While in direct sunlight,this unit has disadvantage on Power tests.

Dead.name: Dead
Dead.description: This unit always succeeds on Morale tests, and cannot be diminished.

\u201cDig!\u201d.name: “Dig!”
\u201cDig!\u201d.description: As an action, choose a space containing an opposed fortification and remove this unit from the battlefield. On the unit's next activation, the target fortification takes 2d6 damage and this unit breaks as though it were in that space.

Dire Hyena Mounts.name: Dire Hyena Mounts
Dire Hyena Mounts.description: This unit has advantage on Attack tests against diminished units.

Disruptive.name: Disruptive
Disruptive.description: When an opposed unit adjacent to this unit activates, it has a 25 percent chance of doing nothing on that activation.

Draconic Ancestry.name: Draconic Ancestry
Draconic Ancestry.description: This unit cannot be disorganized or weakened, and it is immune to the Harrowing trait.

Dragonkin.name: Dragonkin
Dragonkin.description: If there is an allied dragon in the battle or if this unit's commander has some sortof draconic ancestry, this unit has advantage on Attack tests, Command tests, and Morale tests.

Drone.name: Drone
Drone.description: As an action, choose a rank on the battlefield. Each opposed unit in that rank must succeed on a DC 15 Power test or suffer 1 casualty and be unable to move on its next activation. This unit can use this trait only once per battle.

Elfshot.name: Elfshot
Elfshot.description: When this unit succeeds on a Power test as part of an attack, the target unit must succeed on a DC 10 Power test or become weakened until the end of its next activation

Embiggen.name: Embiggen
Embiggen.description: As a reaction to activating, this unit's size increases to 8. Its casualty die becomes a d8 and is incremented twice. Until the end of its activation, the unit has advantage on Attack tests and Power tests. This unit can use this trait only once per battle.

Eternal.name: Eternal
Eternal.description: This unit has advantage on Morale tests against undead or fiend units, and on the Morale test to attack units with the Harrowing trait.

Ethereal.name: Ethereal
Ethereal.description: This unit has +1 to movement. It can move through other units, but only if it can end its movement in an empty space. Other units do not gain bonuses to Defense from fortifications against this unit's attacks.

Fade.name: Fade
Fade.description: After a successful Attack test, this unit canmove back 1 space. Opposed units cannot use the Follow Up maneuver in response.

Fast Siege Weapon.name: Fast Siege Weapon
Fast Siege Weapon.description: This unit can attack a fortification. It automatically hits (no Attack test or Power test needed) and deals 3 damage.

Fast Siege Weapon (Heavy)..name: Fast Siege Weapon (Heavy).
Fast Siege Weapon (Heavy)..description: This unit can attack a fortification. It automatically hits (no Attack test or Power test needed) and deals 5 damage.

Fearless.name: Fearless
Fearless.description: This unit automatically succeeds on Morale tests.

Fearsome.name: Fearsome
Fearsome.description: As a reaction to making an Attack test, this unit forces the target to succeed on aMorale test (DC = 8 + this unit's size) or suffer 1 additional casualty.

Feast.name: Feast
Feast.description: At the end of this unit's activation, if any diminished unit is adjacent to it, increment this unit's casualty die.

Fire Blast.name: Fire Blast
Fire Blast.description: As an action, this unit forces two adjacent opposed units to each make a DC 13 Power test. On a failure, a unit suffers 2 casualties. Recharge 5-6.

Fire Breath.name: Fire Breath
Fire Breath.description: As an action, this unit forces three adjacent opposed units to each make a Power test(DC = 8 + this unit's size). On a failure, a unit suffers 2 casualties and gains a fire token. The fire token inflicts 1 casualty. Recharge 5-6.

Fire Immunity.name: Fire Immunity
Fire Immunity.description: This unit does not suffer casualties from traits or other effects with “burning,” “fire,” or “flame” in their names, or from fire tokens.

Flaming Weapons.name: Flaming Weapons
Flaming Weapons.description: When this unit makes a successful Power test as part of an attack, it adds a fire token to the target in addition to the normal effects of the test. The fire token inflicts 1 casualty.

\u201cFollow The Standard!\u201d.name: “Follow The Standard!”
\u201cFollow The Standard!\u201d.description: When this unit succeeds on a Power test as part of an attack, each cavalry unit the unit's commander controls can usea reaction to immediately make an attack against the target of the Power test.

Guerrillas.name: Guerrillas
Guerrillas.description: When this unit succeeds on an Attack test against any opposed infantry or artillery unit (but not siege weapons), that unit is disoriented.

Gulp.name: Gulp
Gulp.description: As an action, this unit forces an opposed infantry or artillery unit (but not a siege engine) to make a DC 15 Power test. On a failure, the target unit is diminished (or is broken if it was already diminished). Recharge 5-6.

Hallucinatory Spores.name: Hallucinatory Spores
Hallucinatory Spores.description: As an action, this unit forces a legal target to make a DC 15 Power test. On a failure, the opposed unit attacks one of its own allied units of this unit's choice on the opposed unit's next activation.

Hard Hats.name: Hard Hats
Hard Hats.description: This unit has +2 to Defense against attacks from aerial units.

Harriers.name: Harriers
Harriers.description: If this unit succeeds on a Power test aspart of an attack, this unit becomes the target unit's only legal target on its next activation.

Harrowing.name: Harrowing
Harrowing.description: Any opposed infantry, cavalry, oraerial unit must first succeed on a Morale test (DC= 10 + this unit's tier) when it attacks this unit. On a success, the attacking unit is not affected by any unit's Harrowing trait for the rest of the battle. On a failure, the attacking unit's activation ends.

Heroes Of The Myriad Worlds.name: Heroes Of The Myriad Worlds
Heroes Of The Myriad Worlds.description: Once per battle as a bonus action, this unit can gain advantage on Attack tests and Power tests until the end of its activation.

Holy.name: Holy
Holy.description: Undead and fiend units have disadvantage on Attack tests and Power tests against this unit.

Hop.name: Hop
Hop.description: For its movement, this unit can move to any empty space on the battlefield.

Implacable.name: Implacable
Implacable.description: This unit cannot unwillingly be moved or teleported, and it can ignore any effectsof terrain.

Indistinct.name: Indistinct
Indistinct.description: Attack tests for ranged attacks made against this unit have disadvantage.

Inexorable.name: Inexorable
Inexorable.description: This unit is immune to any effect that would hinder or stop its movement, or that would deny it the ability to use actions.

Inspire Fear.name: Inspire Fear
Inspire Fear.description: Whenever this unit leaves an opposed unit diminished, all goblinoid units in the same rank as this unit can immediately attack alegal target.

Into The Breach.name: Into The Breach
Into The Breach.description: When this unit successfully executes the Follow Up maneuver, it has +2 bonusto Defense until the beginning of its next activation.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: This unit cannot be attacked until itsuccessfully attacks an opposed unit

Jaunt.name: Jaunt
Jaunt.description: In place of its movement, remove this unit from the battlefield. It returns to the space it left, or an unoccupied space of the GM's choice if that space is occupied, at the start of its next activation. Recharge 5-6.

Lightning Breath.name: Lightning Breath
Lightning Breath.description: As an action, choose a rank on the battlefield. Each unit in that rank must succeed on a Power test (DC = 8 + this unit's size) or suffer 2 casualties. Recharge 5-6.

Load The Bones!.name: Load The Bones!
Load The Bones!.description: While any diminished unitis adjacent to this unit, this unit has +2 damage against opposed fortifications.

Magical Adepts.name: Magical Adepts
Magical Adepts.description: As a bonus action, this unitforces an opposed unit to make a DC 13 PowerTest. On a failure, allied units have advantage onAttack tests against the opposed unit until the endof the battle. Recharge 5-6.

Maneuver: Detonate.name: Maneuver: Detonate
Maneuver: Detonate.description: As an action, this unitdeals 1d4 + 2 damage to an adjacent fortification.Recharge 3-6.Maneuver: “Evasive Maneuvers!” As areaction when an opposed artillery unit makes an Attack test against this unit, impose disadvantage onthe opposed unit's Attack test. Recharge 5-6.

Maneuver: \u201cFire!!\u201d.name: Maneuver: “Fire!!”
Maneuver: \u201cFire!!\u201d.description: As a reaction to a successful Power test made against a target unit, add a fire token to the target. The fire token inflicts 1 casualty.Recharge 4-6.

Maneuver: \u201cHold The Line!\u201d.name: Maneuver: “Hold The Line!”
Maneuver: \u201cHold The Line!\u201d.description: As a reaction to being diminished, this unit makes a DC 13Command test. On a success, this unit ignores the casualties that caused it to become diminished, andis not diminished.

Maneuver: \u201cLancers! Flank Them!\u20.name: Maneuver: “Lancers! Flank Them!”
Maneuver: \u201cLancers! Flank Them!\u20.description: As are action when an opposed cavalry or aerial unit inflicts 1 or more casualties on an allied infantry or artillery unit, this unit makes a free attack against that opposed unit.

Maneuver: \u201cLand And Charge!\u201d.name: Maneuver: “Land And Charge!”
Maneuver: \u201cLand And Charge!\u201d.description: While this unit has the aerial type, it can use a bonus action to make a DC 11 Command test. On a success, this unit's Power tests have +2 damage on this activation, but the unit's type becomes cavalry. At the end of its next activation, the unit regains the aerial type. Recharge 4-6.

Maneuver: Outflank.name: Maneuver: Outflank
Maneuver: Outflank.description: As an action, move this unit into any empty space. Any opposed unit that executes the Follow Up maneuver in response has disadvantage on the Command test.

Maneuver: \u201cPrey On The Weak.\u201d.name: Maneuver: “Prey On The Weak.”
Maneuver: \u201cPrey On The Weak.\u201d.description: As a reaction to an exposed opposed unit being diminished, this unit makes a DC 10 Command test. On a success, the unit makes an attack against the opposed unit.

Maneuver: Repair.name: Maneuver: Repair
Maneuver: Repair.description: As an action, a fortification this unit is on or adjacent to recovers 1d4 + 2 hitpoints, up to its starting hit points.

Maneuver: \u201cSpit Upon Their Horns.\u.name: Maneuver: “Spit Upon Their Horns.”
Maneuver: \u201cSpit Upon Their Horns.\u.description: As areaction to succeeding on a Power test made as part of an attack, this unit makes a DC 13 Commandtest. On a success, the target unit suffers 1 additional casualty.

Maneuver: Strafe.name: Maneuver: Strafe
Maneuver: Strafe.description: As a reaction to succeeding on a Power test made as part of an attack against an opposed artillery or infantry unit, this unit makes a DC 13 Command test. On a success, two adjacent opposed units in the same rank as the target unit each suffer 1 casualty.

Maneuver: Testudo.name: Maneuver: Testudo
Maneuver: Testudo.description: As a reaction to suffering 1 or more casualties from an opposed artillery or aerial unit's Attack test, this unit makes a DC 13 Command test. On a success, any opposed unit targeting this unit has disadvantage on Power tests until this unit's next activation.

Mass Protection Against Evil..name: Mass Protection Against Evil.
Mass Protection Against Evil..description: Any opposed infantry or artillery unit must succeed on a DC15 Morale test to enter the vanguard rank of this unit's side.

Meld.name: Meld
Meld.description: As a reaction to a successful Attack test against an infantry or artillery unit, this unit can move into the target unit's space. While this unit is in the target's space, the target unit cannot move and can attack only this unit. Units attacking either unit in this space have a 50 percent chance of targeting the wrong unit.

Mobile.name: Mobile
Mobile.description: This unit has advantage on the Command test when using the Follow Up maneuver, and can move back 2 spaces when using the With drawmaneuver.

Nature's Bond.name: Nature's Bond
Nature's Bond.description: When an allied infantry or artillery unit suffers 1 or more casualties, this unit can take the casualty instead. This unit must deploy in its side's front.

Noxious Fog.name: Noxious Fog
Noxious Fog.description: As an action, this unit places two poison tokens in each of 4 adjacent spaces. Any unit that moves into a space with one or more of these poison tokens or that activates there suffers 1 casualty per token. Each space loses one poison token at the end of this unit's subsequent activations. Recharge 5-6.

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: When an adjacent unit that also has this trait successfully uses the Follow Up maneuver, this unit can move into any empty space adjacent to this unit's current position.

Pike Training.name: Pike Training
Pike Training.description: This unit automatically succeeds on Command test for the Set for Charge manuever.

Point Blank.name: Point Blank
Point Blank.description: When this unit succeeds on a Power test as part of an attack against an adjacent unit, it inflicts 1 additional casualty

Poisonous.name: Poisonous
Poisonous.description: When this unit succeeds on a Power test as part of an attack, the target unit is also weakened until the end of its next activation.

Pool Of Soul's Blood.name: Pool Of Soul's Blood
Pool Of Soul's Blood.description: Any opposed infantry or artillery unit adjacent to this unit cannot leave its space.

Quadruped.name: Quadruped
Quadruped.description: For its movement, this unit becomes a cavalry unit until the end of its activation. The unit leaves the grid and then returns to the space it left at the end of its activation (or to its army's reserve rank if that space is occupied). Recharge 5-6.

Ram Riders.name: Ram Riders
Ram Riders.description: When this unit succeeds on a Power test as part of an attack, the target unit must succeed on a followup DC 10 Power test or become disoriented until the end of its next activation.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: This unit can take disadvantage on any Attack test in order to have that Attack test inflict an additional 1 casualty.

Reflector.name: Reflector
Reflector.description: When this unit fails a Power test against a wand, it can use a reaction to roll a d20.On a 10 or higher, this unit suffers no effect from the wand and the unit activating the wand suffers the effect instead.

Regenerate.name: Regenerate
Regenerate.description: Each time this unit activates, increment its casualty die by 1.

Relentless.name: Relentless
Relentless.description: As a reaction to suffering a casualty that would cause this unit to break, this unit makes a DC 13 Power test. On a success, this unit does not break and has 1 casualty.

Rime.name: Rime
Rime.description: Any opposed infantry or artillery unit adjacent to this unit has its movement reduced to 0 and cannot benefit from bonus movement.

Rock!.name: Rock!
Rock!.description: As an action, this unit can make an Attack test against any opposed unit, with disadvantage if the target is an aerial unit. Recharge 4-6.

Rockbreaker.name: Rockbreaker
Rockbreaker.description: This unit deals double damage against fortifications.

Rolling Thunder.name: Rolling Thunder
Rolling Thunder.description: As an action, this unit makes an opposed Power test against an adjacent opposed unit. If this unit's result is equal to or greater than the target's, the target unit must move back 1 space or break. This unit immediately moves into the target unit's vacated space.

Rush.name: Rush
Rush.description: This unit automatically succeeds on the Command test for the Follow Up maneuver.

Savage.name: Savage
Savage.description: Each successful Attack test by this unit adds a bleed token to a target unit. Each bleed token inflicts 2 casualties. Scourge of the Wild. This unit has +2 to Attack and +2 to Power against orc, goblinoid, or elf units.

Scouts.name: Scouts
Scouts.description: This unit can deploy into the rear rankof an opposed army

Screech.name: Screech
Screech.description: As an action, this unit forces an opposed unit to succeed on a DC 15 Power test or become misled. Recharge 4-6.

Shock Troops.name: Shock Troops
Shock Troops.description: Each time this unit causes another unit to be diminished, this unit gains +2 to Attack and +2 to Power until the end of the battle.

Siege Engine.name: Siege Engine
Siege Engine.description: This unit must spend 1 round of battle doing nothing before each attack. This unit can attack a fortification. It automatically hits (no Attack test or Power test needed) and deals 1d4+ 2 damage.

Siege Weapon.name: Siege Weapon
Siege Weapon.description: This unit can attack an adjacent fortification. It automatically hits (no Attack test or Power test needed) and deals 3 damage.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: When this unit succeeds on a Power test aspart of an attack, the target unit is also disoriented.

Smoke Screen..name: Smoke Screen.
Smoke Screen..description: When this unit succeeds on an Attack test against another unit, that unit is also disoriented.

Solar Flare.name: Solar Flare
Solar Flare.description: Once per battle as a reaction totargeting a fortification, the damage this unit deals to fortifications is maximized, and it deals that damage to all fortifications in one rank.

Soporific Spores.name: Soporific Spores
Soporific Spores.description: As an action, this unit forces a legal target to make a DC 13 Power test. On a failure, the opposed unit is disorganized.

Sow Chaos.name: Sow Chaos
Sow Chaos.description: Each opposed unit within 1 space ofthis unit has disadvantage on Morale and Command tests, and suffers 1 additional casualty if itfails the Morale test to avoid becoming diminished.

Spike Shot.name: Spike Shot
Spike Shot.description: As an action, this unit forces a target unit to succeed on a DC 12 Power test or suffer 2 casualties and become weakened. An affected unit can repeat this power test at the end of each of its activations to lose the weakened unit condition. Recharge 5-6.

Split.name: Split
Split.description: When this unit is diminished, place an identical unit with the same current battle statistics and casualties in an empty adjacent space.

Spores.name: Spores
Spores.description: When this unit is targeted by a successful Attack test from an infantry, cavalry, or aerial unit,the attacking unit must succeed on a DC 13 Powertest or become disoriented.

Stalwart.name: Stalwart
Stalwart.description: While this unit is diminished, opposed infantry and cavalry units have disadvantage on Power tests against it.

Stinky.name: Stinky
Stinky.description: Any opposed unit adjacent to this unit has disadvantage on Attack tests.

Stone.name: Stone
Stone.description: Each opposed unit that activates adjacent to this unit suffers 1 casualty

Stoneskin.name: Stoneskin
Stoneskin.description: As a reaction to suffering 1 or more casualties from any opposed artillery unit, this unit can ignore 1 of those casualties.

Strength In Numbers.name: Strength In Numbers
Strength In Numbers.description: This unit begins the battle with 1 additional casualty for each other undead unit in its army (up to a maximum of 12 casualties).

Stupid.name: Stupid
Stupid.description: Each time it attacks, this unit has a 25 percent chance of ignoring its intended target and attacking a random adjacent unit.

Swords Of The Dragon Lord.name: Swords Of The Dragon Lord
Swords Of The Dragon Lord.description: When this unitmakes a successful Attack test against a target unit, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Morale test orsuffer 1 additional casualty.

To The Death.name: To The Death
To The Death.description: If this unit breaks as a result of an opposed infantry, cavalry, or aerial unit's Attack or Power test, the attacking unit suffers 1 casualty.

Veterans Of A Thousand Wars..name: Veterans Of A Thousand Wars.
Veterans Of A Thousand Wars..description: This unit's movement increases by 1. When attacking units of a lower tier, its damage increases by 1.

Wail.name: Wail
Wail.description: Once per battle, this unit can use an action to force each adjacent opposed unit to make a DC15 Power test. On a failure, a unit suffers 1 casualty, and its Morale bonus is reduced to 0 until the end of its next activation. On a success, a unit has disadvantage on Morale tests until the end of its next activation.

Warbred.name: Warbred
Warbred.description: As a reaction to succeeding on a Power test as part of an attack, this unit can make a DC 10 Command test. On a success, this unit can Attack again.

Wave.name: Wave
Wave.description: When this unit succeeds on a Power test as part of an attack against an opposed unit, the opposed unit is pushed back 1 space if there is an empty space behind it. If there is no empty space,the opposed unit and the unit behind it each suffer 1 casualty.

Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.description: When this unit succeeds on an Attack test against an opposed infantry unit, that unit takes -2 to Attack and Defense. Each opposed unit can be affected by this trait once per battle.

You Follow!.name: You Follow!
You Follow!.description: Whenever this unit successfully usesthe Follow Up maneuver, each goblinoid unit in the rank this unit leaves can move 1 space.

Armor Osmosis.name: Armor Osmosis
Armor Osmosis.description: When a heavy or Super-Heavy unit adjacent to this unit breaks, increment this unit's casualty die.

Beacon Of Courage.name: Beacon Of Courage
Beacon Of Courage.description: This unit and any adjacent allied unis automatically succeed on the Morale test to attack units with the Harrowing Trait.

Beacon Of Order.name: Beacon Of Order
Beacon Of Order.description: Adjacent allied units can use this unit's Power bonus on tests to resist the effects of battle magic and can use this unit's Morale bonus on tests to avoid suffering a casualty when affected by battle magic.

Bless The Rains.name: Bless The Rains
Bless The Rains.description: Once per battle, as an action, this unit turns the battlefield's terrain to rain. The terrain remains rain until the end of the battle or until another unit's trait or battle magic changes the terrain.

Close Enough.name: Close Enough
Close Enough.description: This unit counts as a dragon for the purpose of other unit's Dragonkin trait.

Cunning Ambush.name: Cunning Ambush
Cunning Ambush.description: When this unit succeeds on a Power test as part of an attack, it can choose to make the target suffer an extra casualty and this unit becomes hidden until the start of its next activation. Recharge 4-6.

Defy Gravity.name: Defy Gravity
Defy Gravity.description: As an action, this unit can choose one unit adjacent to it. That unit's type becomes aerial until the end of its next activation, and it is temporarily removed from the battlefield. When that unit's type reverts to its original type, it chooses to be placed in one empty space on the battlefield. Recharge 6.

Directed Fire.name: Directed Fire
Directed Fire.description: When this unit attacks a target that is not exposed, allied Tier I and Tier II artillery units that are not siege weapons can attack that target as a reaction.

Expert Fade.name: Expert Fade
Expert Fade.description: After a successful Attack test, this unit can move 1 space. Opposed units cannot use the Follow Up maneuver in response.

Find Path.name: Find Path
Find Path.description: When you deploy this unit, place two hidden path tokens, one on each side of the battlefield, wherever you choose. Any elf unit can move between spaces with hidden path tokens as if they were adjacent. Any unit that is not an elf unit takes 1 casualty if it ends its activation on a space with a hidden path token. If a rank with a hidden path token collapses, the token moves forward into the closest space that is not collapsed. The hidden path tokens remain on the battlefield until the end of the battle.

Frame.name: Frame
Frame.description: When this unit is diminished, it has disadvantage on attacks and its Damage is reduced by 1.

Fury.name: Fury
Fury.description: Whenever this unit suffers casualites, its Attack and Power increase by 1 for each casualty it suffers. This bonus lasts until the end of the battle. Additionally, while htis unit is diminished, its Damage increases by 1.

Goblin Battle Platform.name: Goblin Battle Platform
Goblin Battle Platform.description: This unit cannot be rallied during a battle. When this unit breaks, place a unit of Goblin Smokers under your control on the battlefield according to normal deployment rules. After the battle, the Goblin Smokers disband and you can make a Rally test for this unit.

Harpoon.name: Harpoon
Harpoon.description: When this unit succeeds on a Power test made as part of an attack against a cavalry or aerial unit, the target unit is snared (see Snared Condition), and this unit's activation ends.

Hellfire Cannons.name: Hellfire Cannons
Hellfire Cannons.description: As an action, this unit can force all opposed aerial units to make a DC 13 Command Test. On a failure, an opposed unit takes 2 casualties and has disadvantage on Attack tests until the end of its next turn. On a success, the opposed unit takes 1 casualty and doesn't suffer disadvantage on its next attack from this trait. Recharge 5-6.

It Will Burn As We Burn.name: It Will Burn As We Burn
It Will Burn As We Burn.description: When this unit is affected by one or more fire tokens and succeeds on a Power Test from an attack, the target of the attack gains a fire token that inflicts 1 casualty.

Lightning.name: Lightning
Lightning.description: When this unit succeeds on a Power test as part of an attack, the target unit must make a Power test (DC = 10 + this unit's tier). On a failure, the target is disorganized. On a success, the target unit is disoriented.

Made From Magic.name: Made From Magic
Made From Magic.description: This unit has advantage on tests to use battle magic. Opposing units have disadvantage on tests to use battle magic targeting this unit.

Maneuver: Break Them.name: Maneuver: Break Them
Maneuver: Break Them.description: As a reaction to this unit diminishing another unit, make a DC 16 command test a success, the diminished unit is broken.

Maneuver: Focused Aim.name: Maneuver: Focused Aim
Maneuver: Focused Aim.description: As a bonus action, this unit can increase its Damage by 1 until the end of its activation. To take this bonus action, the unit must not have moved this activation, and after taking this bonus action, it cannot move until the start of its next activation. Recharge 5-6.

Maneuver: Scamp-Ede Of Corgis.name: Maneuver: Scamp-Ede Of Corgis
Maneuver: Scamp-Ede Of Corgis.description: As an action, this unit chooses one exposed unit, and chaotically frolics through its space. If the unit is an opposed unit, it becomes disorganized. If the unit is an allied unit, it automatically succeeds on Morale tests until the end of its next activation. Recharge 4-6.

Master Elf-Shot.name: Master Elf-Shot
Master Elf-Shot.description: When this unit succeeds on a Power test as part of an attack, the target unit must succeed on a DC 15 Power test or become weakened until the end of its next activation.

Max Burn!.name: Max Burn!
Max Burn!.description: As a reaction to activating this unit can suffer 1 casualty. If it does so, it gets one extra attack and has advantage on Power tests this activation.

Mobile Battery.name: Mobile Battery
Mobile Battery.description: On this unit's activation, it can either take an action or move, but not both.

Now This Is An Aaauuugh!!!.name: Now This Is An Aaauuugh!!!
Now This Is An Aaauuugh!!!.description: When this unit is diminished, each time it takes casualties from an attack, the attacking unit suffers 1 casualty.

Offensive.name: Offensive
Offensive.description: As a reaction to this unit failing an Attack test, this unit can make a DC 13 Command test. On a success, this unit can attack again.

Only The Smart Survive.name: Only The Smart Survive
Only The Smart Survive.description: This unit has advantage on tests to resist battle magic, and tests to make maneuvers against this unit have disadvantage.

Owlbears Can'T Fly?!.name: Owlbears Can'T Fly?!
Owlbears Can'T Fly?!.description: While this unit has the cavalry type, it can use a bonus action to change its type to Aerial until the beginning of its next activation. Recharge 5-6.

Plagued.name: Plagued
Plagued.description: When this unit makes a successful Power test as part of an attack, the target gains a poison token in addition to the normal effects of the test. Each poison token inflicts 1 casualty.

Power Word: Annihilate.name: Power Word: Annihilate
Power Word: Annihilate.description: Once per battle as an action, this unit targets one diminished unit on the battlefield. That unit breaks.

Ride The Lightning.name: Ride The Lightning
Ride The Lightning.description: As an action, this unit can make a DC 13 Command test to target a unit with this trait. On a success, the target unit and each unit adjacent to it must succeed on a DC 15 Power test or suffer 1 casualty, or 2 casualties if the terrain is rain. Recharge 6.

Shock And Awe.name: Shock And Awe
Shock And Awe.description: As an action, this unit chooses a space on the battlefield. Each unit in that space and every adjacent space must succeed on a DC 14 Power test or suffer 2 casualties and suffer disadvantage on Command and Morale checks until the end of its next turn. Recharge 4-6.

Siege Weapon (Heavy).name: Siege Weapon (Heavy)
Siege Weapon (Heavy).description: This unit can attack an adjacent fortification. It automatically hits (no Attack test or Power test needed) and deals 5 damage.

Strength Of The Wilds.name: Strength Of The Wilds
Strength Of The Wilds.description: While this unit is in a space with a hidden path token, it has advantage on Attack tests.

Stygian Orb.name: Stygian Orb
Stygian Orb.description: As a reaction to an opposed unit breaking, the Rolling Graveyard can replace that unit with a Ghoul Infantry unit under the command of this unit's commander.

Survival Of The Fittest.name: Survival Of The Fittest
Survival Of The Fittest.description: This unit cannot suffer more than 2 casualties during its or another unit's activation. When an opposing unit succeeds on an Attack test against this unit and this unit is diminished, make a DC 15 Command test. On a success, the opposing Attack test fails instead.

Terror-Dactyls.name: Terror-Dactyls
Terror-Dactyls.description: As a reaction to making an Attack test, this unit forces the target to succeed on a Morale test (DC = 8 + this unit's size) or become disoriented.

Wireless.name: Wireless
Wireless.description: This unit always succeeds on Command and Morale tests.

You Will Be Upgraded.name: You Will Be Upgraded
You Will Be Upgraded.description: As a reaction to becoming broken, this unit can target an adjacent diminished unit and make a DC 15 Power test. On success, this unit breaks and can't be rallied unitl the end of battle, and this unit's commander gains control of the target unit. The target unit's defense becomes 16 and its toughness becomes 20.

Venomous.name: Venomous
Venomous.description: When this unit succeeds on an attack test as part of an attack,, the target gains a poison token the target gains a poison token in addition to the normal effects of the test. Each poison token inflicts 1 casualty.

Magic Resistant.name: Magic Resistant
Magic Resistant.description: This unit has advantage on Power tests to resist battle magic.

Thralls: Enthralled.name: Thralls: Enthralled
Thralls: Enthralled.description: This unit only serves because the individuals who make it up are under the charming spell of a powerful spellcaster that must also be deployed. If the controlling unit breaks, this unit also breaks.

Thralls: Enthralling.name: Thralls: Enthralling
Thralls: Enthralling.description: This Unit Controlls Two Or More Units With The "Thralls: Enthralled" Trait. If This Unit Breaks, Those Units Also Break.

Forest.name: Forest
Forest.description: As long as this unit is not deminished, another unit can stack on this unit even if it is not in reserve. When another unit stacks on this one, The stacked unit considers this space to be the "forest" terrain type. If an opposed artillery unit misses the stacked because of the disadvantage imposed by forest terrain, this unit is hit by the opposed artillery instead.

Tree Stride.name: Tree Stride
Tree Stride.description: This unit gets +1 bonus movement when it moves through the forest terrain type.

Flamable.name: Flamable
Flamable.description: Units attacking this with flaming weapons, or abilities that include Fire, Flame, etc in the title or description will have advantage.

Maneuver: Dragon Breath.name: Maneuver: Dragon Breath
Maneuver: Dragon Breath.description: As an action, choose an adjacent opposed unit. The opposed unit must succeed on a Power test (DC = 8+this unit's size). On a failure, this unit suffers 2 casualties and gains a fire token. Recharge 5-6.

Brave.name: Brave
Brave.description: This unit has advantage on Morale tests.

Short.name: Short
Short.description: This unit has advantage on Defense Tests against attacks by Aerial and Cavalry units.

Resourceful.name: Resourceful
Resourceful.description: This unit is immune to the penalties from starting a battle with a negative Resource Defense level.

Crusading.name: Crusading
Crusading.description: This unit has advantage on Attack Tests and Power Tests against undead and fiend units.

Holy Water Ammunition.name: Holy Water Ammunition
Holy Water Ammunition.description: This unit causes 1 extra casualty when it succeeds on Power tests against undead or fiend units.

Armored Carapace.name: Armored Carapace
Armored Carapace.description: This unit suffers no casualties from artillery Attack Tests.

Scourge Of The Wild.name: Scourge Of The Wild
Scourge Of The Wild.description: This unit has +2 to attack and +2 to power against orc, goblinoid, or elf units.

Pikeman.name: Pikeman
Pikeman.description: When this unit is attacked by a cavalry unit, it may use its reaction to attack the cavalry unit first. On success, it makes an attack against the cavalry unit first. If the Cavalry unit survives, its attack happens as normal. Because this unit weilds two-handed pikes, it cannot weild shields. Opposed infantry and artillery therefore get advantage on attacks made against it.
